name: Wellfire Labs
tagline: Open-source projects from the Wellfire Interactive team
body:
## [Django Addendum](http://wellfire.github.com/django-addendum)

Easily edit arbitrary text snippets on a site without a full-fledged CMS or issuing another site release. Like a mini-CMS for every site.

## [Django Organizations](http://github.com/bennylope/django-organizations)

Sane multi-user accounts: django-organizations is an application that provides group account functionality for Django, allowing user access and rights to be consolidated into group accounts.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
